artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of himalaya sidebar keybindings, pagination issues, and preloading opportunities with implementation recommendations
5-phase implementation plan fixing pagination CLI flags, adding error handling, implementing preloading, and enhancing action key documentation

active_projects.completion_summary: Fixed himalaya sidebar pagination by replacing incorrect --offset CLI flag with correct -p (page) flag. Added error logging for async email fetch, implemented page preloading for faster navigation, and enhanced ? key notification with specific action key examples (<leader>med, <leader>mea, <leader>mer).

artifacts.summary: Research on systemd user service configuration for ProtonMail Bridge auto-start, covering best practices, home-manager integration patterns, and implementation recommendations
4-phase plan covering service verification, integration testing, and documentation for ProtonMail Bridge systemd user service
